Translations.Text: Sluzhatʹ yim budutʹ nevmyrushchi sluzhbovtsi. Koly vy bachyte yikh, vony budutʹ vyhlyadaty, yak rozihnani perly
De zavhodno vy dyvytesʹ, vy pobachyte blazhenstvo, ta dyvovyzhnyy dominion
Na nykh bude odyah zelenoho oksamytu, atlasu, ta sribla ornamenty. Yikhniy Lord zabezpechytʹ yikh z chystymy napoyim
Tse yavlyaye soboyu vynahorodu shcho ochikuye vas, dlya vashykh zusylʹ buly otsineni
My vidkryly do vas tse Quran; spetsialʹne vidkryttya z nas
Vy budete steadfastly vykonaty vashi zapovidi Lorda, ta ne pidkoryayetesya budʹ-yakomu sinful disbeliever sered nykh
Ta svyatkuyutʹ nazvu vashoho dnya Lorda ta nochi
Protyahom nochi, padayutʹ prostrate pered tym, yak Yo, ta glorify Yo bahato dovhoyi nochi
Tsi lyudy preoccupied z tse fleeting zhyttya, v toy chas, yak disregarding - tilʹky poperedu nykh - vazhkyy denʹ
My utvoryly yikh, ta vstanovyly yikh, ta, koly zavhodno my budemo, my mozhemo zaminyty inshi u yikhnʹomu mistsi
Tse ye reminder: whoever wills bude vybraty shlyakh do yoho Lorda
Shchob ni vy budete ye z·hidno z BOZHYM budete. BOH Omniscient, Mudryy
Vin prypuskaye whomever Vin wills u Yoho myloserdya. Yak dlya porushnykiv, Vin maye hotovi do nykh bolisnyy retribution
(Anhely) vidpravlyav pidryad
Shchob zahnaty viter
Vorushatʹsya khmary
Rozpodilyayutʹ umovy
Dostavlyayutʹ povidomlennya
Harna novyna, tak zhe, yak i poperedzhennya
Shcho obitsyayetʹsya prybudutʹ proyty
Otzhe, koly zirky vydobuyutʹsya
nebo vidkryvayetʹsya
hory pidryvayutʹsya
kur'yery sklykayutʹsya
Shcho yavlyaye soboyu pryznachenyy denʹ
Denʹ Rishennya
Shcho Denʹ Rishennya
Prykroshchi na shcho denʹ do rejectors
my ne vynyshchyly bilʹsh ranni heneratsiyi
Todi my zrobyly inshym sliduyemo za nymy
Tse ye yaki my do zlochyntsiv
Prykroshchi na shcho denʹ do rejectors
my ne utvoryly vas z nyzʹko ridki
Todi my rozmistyly tse u dobre-zakhyshchenomu skladi
Protyahom spetsyfichnoho periodu
My obmiryly tse akuratno. My yavlyayemo soboyu krashchykh dyzayneriv
Prykroshchi na shcho denʹ do rejectors
my ne zrobyly zemlyu abode
Dlya zhyvyy ta mertvyy
My rozmistyly na tse vysoki hory, ta yakshcho vy z svizhoyu vodoyu vypyty
Prykroshchi na shcho denʹ do rejectors
Idete do shcho vy vykorystaly disbelieve
Idutʹ do tini trʹokh riznykh shchilʹnosti
Dosi, tse zabezpechuye ni coolness, ni zakhyst z tepla
Tse kydaye iskru taki velyki yak osobnyaky
Takyy zhovtyy yak kolir verblyudiv
Prykroshchi na shcho denʹ do rejectors
Shcho yavlyaye soboyu denʹ vony ne rozmovlyayutʹ
Ne podani vony dozvil pereprosyty
Prykroshchi na shcho denʹ do rejectors
Tse yavlyaye soboyu Denʹ Rishennya. My sklykaly vas ta poperedni heneratsiyi
Yakshcho vy mayete budʹ-yaki skhemy, idete vpered ta skhema
Prykroshchi na shcho denʹ do rejectors
spravedlyvyy otrymayutʹ nasolodu vid tini ta pruzhyn
Ta frukty shcho vony bazhayutʹ
Hostyatʹsya ta napiy happily v obmin na vashi pratsi
My takym chynom nahorodzhuyemo dobrochesnyy
Prykroshchi na shcho denʹ do rejectors
Hostyatʹsya ta polyublyayutʹ tymchasovo; vy ye vynuvati
Prykroshchi na shcho denʹ do rejectors
Koly vony rozpovidayutʹsya, "Klanyayutʹsya vnyz," vony ne klanyayutʹsya vnyz
Prykroshchi na shcho denʹ do rejectors
Kotryy Hadith, za vynyatkom tse, vony uphold
